metadata.name: 2022 World Cup Salute #1
metadata.description:
There are four international soccer teams among the Salute World Cup NFT, which include "Argentina", "Brazil", "Belgium", and "Germany". Retaining the basic colors of the original national uniforms, the NFT are infused with new totem creation and typeface design to add more lines to enhance the overall visual texture and ensure social recognition of each country's international team. Each Salute image represents the IP of each team's player, and each team's uniform corresponds to the star player participating in the 2022 World Cup. The designer creates a exclusive uniform for each team, so that each International team can be more integral and full of teamwork spirit. Most importantly, competition comes after friendship. At the same time, the NFT also record the historic moment of the 2022 World Cup.
Note: The World Cup theme is just a branch race of Salute project, and our main line is the NFT project centered on international theme, which will be launched in the first quarter of 2023
